description:
Haneru and gang have to visit Jey`s territory, Bright Island, for the final round of Dance Road, so they head there along with Blossom Bullets on Hinata and Manabi`s private jet. The girl tengu, Momiji, also ends up tagging along. And once they get there, Mabel finally tells them why Dance Road has to be kept secret. Just what is this shocking revelation?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Tsui ni Kita! Jey no Shima
ついに来た! ジェイの島
